language.name: language
language.description: Language to write the generator in.

folder.name: folder
folder.description: Project where to create the generator.

list.description: List all the available project template generators.

port.name: port
port.description: Port to start the local login server.

auth-url.name: auth-url
auth-url.description: URL to validate and refresh tokens.

new.description: Create a project with a new Prismic repository.

domain.name: domain
domain.description: Name of the Prismic repository. For example: repo-name, becomes https://repo-name.prismic.io.

skip-install.name: skip-install
skip-install.description: Prevent running install command after generating project.

existing-repo.name: existing-repo
existing-repo.description: Connect to an existing Prismic repository.

base.name: base
base.description: Base URL to sign up with.

port.name: port
port.description: Port to start the local login server.

auth-url.name: auth-url
auth-url.description: URL to use when validating and refreshing sessions.

setup.name: setup
setup.description: Setup Slice Machine in an already existing project.

create-slice.name: create-slice
create-slice.description: Add a Slice to a Slice Machine project.

add-storybook.name: add-storybook
add-storybook.description: Add Storybook to a Slice Machine project.

framework.name: framework
framework.description: framework to use, see list for options

existing-repo.name: existing-repo
existing-repo.description: Connect to an existing Prismic repository when running --setup or --bootstrap

theme.description: Create a project from a ZIP file or a GitHub repository URL and a new Prismic repository.

domain.name: domain
domain.description: Name of the new Prismic repository. For example, repo-name becomes https://repo-name.prismic.io.

theme-url.name: theme-url
theme-url.description: GitHub URL or path to the theme file.

documents.name: documents
documents.description: Path to the documents in the theme.

customTypes.name: customTypes
customTypes.description: Path to the Custom Types directory in the theme.

skip-install.name: skip-install
skip-install.description: Prevent running install command after generating project.

existing-repo.name: existing-repo
existing-repo.description: Connect to an existing Prismic repository.

args.name: source
args.description: Path or URL to a ZIP file, or a GitHub repository for the theme.

whoami.description: Shows the email of the current user.
